name: The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Legends
name_original: The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Legends
description:
The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Legends is a strategy game developed by Blue Byte. It came out on 01-01-2006. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Legends is available on PC.
